body_html: Ok try our new 0.7.1 wheel (cleanly uninstall tensorflow 0.7.0 and protobuf, then install 0.7.1). The pip installation requires cudnn v4 though. Otherwise you'll need to install from sources.
body_text: Ok try our new 0.7.1 wheel (cleanly uninstall tensorflow 0.7.0 and protobuf, then install 0.7.1).  The pip installation requires cudnn v4 though.  Otherwise you'll need to install from sources.
body: Ok try our new 0.7.1 wheel (cleanly uninstall tensorflow 0.7.0 and protobuf, then install 0.7.1).  The pip installation requires cudnn v4 though.  Otherwise you'll need to install from sources.
